results.content: Wow! This course was awesome! Colt's methodology is really good, the difficult topics are very well explained by him or the TAs in the Q&A section, also they give lots of resources if you want to learn more. Just know that you will need a lot of consistency to go through all the sections, it was hard sometimes but it was worth it. Thank you so much to Colt, the TAs and all the fellow students who share their knowledge in the Q&A.

results.content: Colt is very good in explaining every bit of details that a developer needs to learn.  Not a single topic is boring, every topic is very informative and he makes it easy to understand.

results.content:
Amazing course to get familiar with Web Development. Explanation for every concept is provided. This is my fifth course with Colt Steele and 
I can confidently say that this guy knows what he teaches. The TA's were extremely helpful in solving my queries I got while following the course.

results.content: My hearty thanks to my Guru Mr. Colt. You are really an asset to this generation. You make zeroes to heroes. We are blessed to have Guru like you. Thanks to Udemy for showing you as I was searching a Guru like you for years. This course is perfect. You poured your knowledge like a rain. I am not a continuous learner but your lectures pulled me back even if I am dejected and took longer breaks in between. I was very new to web development when I started the course and now I can understand its life cycle better. Will follow your advice and proceed my learning. Thank you and may God bless all your wishes.

results.content: I really enjoyed this course and learned a ton! Some lessons force you to seek solutions in the Q/A because the way things are done constantly changes in the tech world, but that can be part of the learning experience because problem solving is a huge part of becoming a developer! The final project uses a lot of packages and outside resources which means that 5 years from now you would probably have to update a lot of the code for the project to make it continue to work. Packages and outside resources have updates and newer versions constantly. This means you have to stay up to date with them and so does your code!

results.content: What an amazing experience this course was! Colt is really a master teacher,  and the tools shown are very useful and widely used professionally. Also was heavily impressed by the whole team as the assistance during the course was very in-depth. The learning experience was better than my whole engineering degree by a mile. Thank you so much!

results.content: Great, GIANT course. It covers so much. I started to get frustrated towards the end because, even though the course has been updated, there were updates to many of the dependencies and that was difficult to figure out while seeing it all for the first time. Overall, I highly recommend it and really enjoyed the course structure and how we learned the later concepts while applying them to the YelpCamp project.

results.content:
To anyone starting to learn development - whether web dev, mobile dev, frontend, backend whatever, this should be the first course. It literally covers all the basics needed from ground up to a very good level from where you can take the knowledge you gained and learn advanced topics, or maybe start building applications on your own.
This is the best course, the instructor is super awesome.
